readingMnemonic: The <kanji>lodge</kanji> <reading>shook</reading> (しゅく) as the hundred people came tumbling in through the door. It shook, but it didn't fall over. The roof stayed firmly in place, and everyone got to sleep under it okay.
meaningMnemonic: The <radical>roof</radical> under which the <radical>leader</radical> can house one <radical>hundred</radical> of his people is at the local <kanji>lodge</kanji>.
